title: LG will refresh the mid-range K8 and K10 at MWC 2018
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * LG said the K8 (2018) hasn’t been treated to as big of an upgrade as the K10.It has a revamped 8MP rear-facing camera, a faster rear-mounted fingerprintscanner, a 1.3GHz quad-core CPU and 2GB of RAM (up from 1.5GB), but that’sabout it.Mobile World Congress (MWC 2018) is scheduled to run from February 26 throughMarch 1. A number of leading manufacturers – including Huawei, LG, Samsung andSony – are expected to take the wraps off new hardware at the gathering.**Related:[Galaxy S9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s9-release-date-specs-features-price-uk-3266552)****Does the LG K8 (2018) or LG K10 (2018) sound like something you’d beinterested in finding out more about?
